Voter Lookup


Search

Enter information to search for your voter information.

Provide your first name as it appears on your voter registration record.
First name is required and may contain only letters and spaces.
Provide your last name as it appears on your voter registration record.
Last name is required and may contain only letters, hyphens, and spaces.
Provide your date of birth as it appears on your voter registration record.
Date of birth is required and must be in mm/dd/yyyy format.
Provide the 5 digit zip code of the Maryland residential address provided on your voter registration record.
Zip code is required and must be exactly 5 numeric characters.
Provide the street number of the Maryland residential address provided on your voter registration record. Letters and 1/2 indicators are not necessary.
Street number must contain only numbers, letters, commas, hyphens, and forward slashes.
Provide your middle initial as it appears on your voter registration record.
Middle initial can be only a single alpha character.

 
Results
Based on what you entered, we were unable to find any information.
Before trying again, please:
  • Enter your name the same way you registered to vote. For example, if you registered to vote as “Jeff” instead of “Jeffrey,” use “Jeff” for the search.
  • If you moved recently, enter the zip code where you lived before.
  • If you changed your name recently, enter your former name.
  • If you believe you are registered but you still cannot find your information, contact your local board of elections.
  • If you have not registered before, you may register to vote online.

Remember that it may take up to 3 weeks after your registration was submitted for the data to get posted to this site.
We update this website daily. If you submitted information today, you will not be able to see it yet. If you submitted information online or at the MVA, it may take up to 3 weeks to appear on this website.
